sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他听了笑话后哈哈大笑。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā tīng le xiàohua hòu hāhā dàxiào.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a éclaté de rire après avoir entendu la blague.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He laughed loudly after hearing the joke.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Guānzhòngmen rèliè de gǔzhǎng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le public a applaudi chaleureusement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The audience applauded warmly.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ yào hǎohǎo xuéxí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tu dois bien étudier.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You should study hard.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Guónèi de jīngjì fāzhǎn hěn kuài.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'économie nationale se développe rapidement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The domestic economy is developing rapidly.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这项政策受到广大群众的支持。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè xiàng zhèngcè shòudào guǎngdà qúnzhòng de zhīchí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette politique est soutenue par les masses.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This policy is supported by the broad masses.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen yào guīfàn shìchǎng zhìxù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons standardiser l'ordre du marché.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We need to standardize market order.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī gè héfǎ de gōngsī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est une entreprise légale.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a legal company.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen yīnggāi hùxiāng bāngzhù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devrions nous aider mutuellement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We should help each other.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 全世界人民都渴望和平。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Quán shìjiè rénmín dōu kěwàng hépíng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tous les peuples du monde aspirent à la paix.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: People all over the world long for peace.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīnwǎn yǒu yī chǎng huàjù biǎoyǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a une pièce de théâtre ce soir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There is a play tonight.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen zài hú shàng huáchuán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous ramons sur le lac.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We are rowing on the lake.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Huánbǎo shì měi gè rén de zérèn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La protection de l'environnement est la responsabilité de chacun.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Environmental protection is everyone's responsibility.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng hē yī bēi hóngchá.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je voudrais boire une tasse de thé noir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I want to drink a cup of black tea.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè píng hóngjiǔ hěn guì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette bouteille de vin rouge est très chère.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This bottle of red wine is very expensive.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā gōngzuò tàidù hěn jījí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a une attitude très positive au travail.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has a very positive attitude toward work.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì Hànyǔ de jīběn yǔfǎ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est la grammaire de base du chinois.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is the basic grammar of Chinese.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jìzhě zhèngzài cǎifǎng shìzhǎng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le journaliste interviewe le maire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The journalist is interviewing the mayor.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīntiān rè jíle.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il fait extrêmement chaud aujourd'hui.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: It's extremely hot today.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bāng wǒ jìsuàn yīxià zǒngjià.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez m'aider à calculer le prix total.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please help me calculate the total price.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们继续讨论这个问题。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen jìxù tǎolùn zhège wèntí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Continuons à discuter de ce problème.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Let's continue discussing this issue.
